title: 6 Countries with Incentives to Retire There
excerpt: From Greece to Panama, these countries offer tax breaks and steep discounts for foreign retirees.

title: Hacker News

title: It’s Never Too Late to Pick Up Your Life and Move to Italy
excerpt: Holly Herrmann vowed to move to Italy when she was 20. Her dream came true 38 years later.

title: 14 Towns Near Asheville, North Carolina, That Are Just as Cool
excerpt: Known for its beautiful setting in the Blue Ridge Mountains, Asheville, North Carolina, is a charming metropolis for those seeking a mid-sized city to call home (its population is just a hair under 94,000). Aside from abundant natural beauty and a temperate climate, Asheville offers a lively arts and music scene, plus diverse cuisines and more breweries per capita than any other U.S. city. (Its unofficial nickname? Beer City USA.
